Package com.project.alertapp.controllers

Class StockController

java.lang.Object
com.project.alertapp.controllers.StockController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/stocks") public class StockController extends Object
This class provides REST request for stocks.
Author:
KaanSarigul

  • Method Details

    • getAllStocks

      @GetMapping public List<StockModel> getAllStocks()
      This method sends a request to stockService to get all stocks.
      Returns:
      Returns list of stocks.

    • saveStocksToDatabase

      @PostMapping public List<StockModel> saveStocksToDatabase()
      This method sends a request to stockService to save stocks
      Returns:
      Returns saved Stock

    • getOneStock

      @GetMapping("/{ticker}") public StockModel getOneStock​(@PathVariable String ticker)
      This method sends a request to stockService to get one stock with ticker parameter.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Ticker uses as stock symbol which retrieve stock data from yahooFinance.
      Returns:
      Returns the specified stock data.

    • saveOneStock

      @PostMapping("/{ticker}") public StockModel saveOneStock​(@PathVariable String ticker)
      This method sends a request to stockService to save one stock with ticker parameter.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Ticker uses as stock symbol which retrieve stock data from yahooFinance.
      Returns:
      Returns the saved stock data.

    • deleteOneStock

      @DeleteMapping("/{ticker}") public void deleteOneStock​(@PathVariable String ticker)
      This method sends a request to stockService to delete one stock with ticker parameter.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Ticker uses as stock symbol which retrieve stock data from yahooFinance.

    • softDeleteStock

      @PutMapping("/{ticker}") public StockModel softDeleteStock​(@PathVariable String ticker, @RequestBody SoftDeleteRequest deleteRequest)
      This method sends a request to stockService to soft delete one stock with ticker parameter.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Ticker uses as stock symbol which retrieve stock data from yahooFinance.
      deleteRequest - SoftDeleteRequest object contains soft delete situation for an object.
      Returns:
      Returns updated stock.
